job.title: Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pstrongAbout the RolestrongppCome join our creative team that is on a mission to making Data Analysts and Engineers more productive by drastically reducing the time required to build pipelines and wrangle the log data for further  a Machine Learning Engineer your responsibility will be to develop novel approaches to analyzing data from log files generated by Networking devices applications databases and other infrastructureppstrongnbspstrongppstrongRoles and ResponsibilitiesstrongpulliOptimize machine learning models to scale in realtime streaming applicationsliliDevelop ML models to support anomaly detection from IT infrastructure environmentsliliDesign develop and evaluate stateoftheart machine learning models for complex largescale data setsliliEmbrace a fastpaced collaborative environment dedicated to building cuttingedge technology solutions using machine learningliulpbrppstrongWhat you will needstrongpulli24 years of programming experience in Python Scala C CliliAt least 2 years of experience with the PyData ecosystem NumPy Pandas and ScikitlearnliliExperience in analyzing machinegenerated data fromnbspapplications networking devices other infrastructureliliBachelors degree in STEM field or equivalent work experience in related fieldliliAbility to work in a fastpaced startup environment with quick turnaround timelilisecurity clearance is a plus liulpbrppstrongnbspstrongppstrongnbspstrongppSliceup is an equal opportunity employer dedicated to diversity equality and inclusion and provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment Sliceup prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race color religion age sex national origin disability status genetics protected veteran status sexual orientation gender identity or expression or any other characteristic protected by federalnbspstatenbspor local lawsp
